thread.section_title: Evergreen.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Evergreen.ie | www.evergreen.ie
thread.title: Denise

author: Denise
title: Denise
text:
I ordered online for the first time from Evergreen and was very impressed. My order was delivered as promised within the time frame given. I did lots of research for organic supermarket's and decided to give Evergreen a go because they offered free delivery and their prices were very good. I live in a rural location were it is challenging to find good organic products. I am very delighted with Evergreen and most definitely will order again soon.
Thank you for your great customer service.
